bgDescription:
A solid solvent made using a special process allows the user to use Echo Forte more frequently.
“I run faster after taking this, which means I must have gotten lighter, which means I have gotten thinner... So does it mean it’s also a weight-loss product?”
description: Reduces the cooldown of the selected Resonator's Echo skills in the party by 30% for 180 seconds, effective only on your own Characters in Co-op.
